description: The Department of Public Works and Government Services seeks to acquire a Fixed Aircraft Fire Trainer from the offerors for use by the Department of National Defence at CFB Borden. The contractor will supply, deliver, install and train the end-user on the fixed-wing fighter aircraft fire protection system.
